results.title: The Best of BBC golf
results.brief_description: Golf lovers have been highly rewarded over the years by the excellent golf coverage of the BBC team. Now the greatest highlights have been recorded in one program. Alex Hay presents memorable moments from four decades of top international golf.

results.title: The Best of 'Out' & 'Out on Tuesday'
results.creator_credit: Pratibha Parmar, Peter Wells, Richard Kwietniowski, Stewart Main, Cheryl Farthing, Clare Beavan, Susan Ardill, Rebecca Dodds and Channel 4
results.brief_description: UK Channel 4’s ‘Out’ and ‘Out on Tuesday’, hosted by Julian Clary, were the world’s first networked TV series for lesbians and gay men. Debuting in 1989, the show was consistently stylish, informed and audacious. This collection brings together 7 of the best segments: “Talking Hairs”, a snappy catalogue of gay hairstyles; “Comic Cuts” explores the real world of lesbian and gay comic books; “Pride ‘91” celebrates the 1991 London Gay Pride march; “Fasten Your Seatbelts” is a speedy montage of Hollywood’s perverse subtexts; “Postcard from New Zealand” is Peter Wells’ touching and humorous video postcard; “Khush” explores the lives of South Asian lesbians and gay men; “Girls in Boy Bars” investigates how women - straight or gay - feel in gay male bars.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Pratibha Parmar, Peter Wells, Richard Kwietniowski, Stewart Main, Cheryl Farthing, Clare Beavan, Susan Ardill, Rebecca Dodds and Channel 4

results.title: The Best little whorehouse in Texas [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Colin Higgins, Robert L Boyett, Edward Milkis, Thomas Miller, RKO Radio Pictures and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: A sheriff and a proprietess join together not only in romance, but to fight a big city TV crusader in his efforts to expose the Chicken Ranch to public scandal, and thus close it down. Based on the stage play written by Larry L. King and Peter Masterton. Cast includes Burt Reynolds, Dolly Parton, Dom DeLuise, Charles Durning, Jim Nabors, Robert Mandan.

results.title: The Best life
results.creator_credit: Keifer Yu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Keifer Yu takes us beyond the tourist attractions of Broome, Western Australia, to the cultures therein. Yu focuses on the Indigenous and Chinese cultures of which he is a part. He considers how the differing cultures have enriched his life and how they blend in together in this unique community.

results.title: The Best kept secret...
results.creator_credit: Jamie Inilson, Davy Tristram and Juniper Films
results.brief_description: Impressions of life in Western Samoa, a tropical island in the South Pacific. Covers the daily activities of the people, sport and traditional dancing. Facilities available for the tourist are shown, together with aerial views of rugged coastlines, sandy bays, coral reefs and palms.

results.title: The Best damn fiddler from Calabogie to Kaladar
results.creator_credit: Peter Pearson, Barrie Howells, John Kemeny and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A story from an Upper Ottawa Valley logging community, about a man who chooses the unfettered life and uncertain income of an itinerant bush worker, even though it means that his family live poorly. The film is a study of the effects on family life of isolation and deprivation. Suitable for Upper Secondary level students.

results.title: The Best bits of the Late Show Vol. 3
results.creator_credit: Joe Murray, Mark Gibson, Michael Hirsch, ABC-TV (Australia) and D Generation
results.brief_description: Finally all the ‘classic’ Logie-winning moments from the Logie-winning second series of the Logie-winning D-Generation’s Logie-winning ‘The Late Show’. See such cult classics as: Shitscared, Glengarry Glenn Ridge, Charlie the Wonderdog, Schwarzenegger’s Citizen Kane, The Oz Brothers, Mick’s underpants, Street interviews galore, spectacular, musical finals, including Joan Kirner doing Joan Jett, plus dozens more ‘Champagne Comedy’ sketches.

results.title: The Best bits of the Late Show
results.creator_credit: Joe Murray, Mark Gibson, Michael Hirsch, ABC-TV (Australia) and D Generation
results.brief_description: Here is your chance to be treated to some ‘Champagne comedy’ from the D-Generation team’s crowning Glory - The Late Show. Re-live these classic moments; Shitscared, Graham and the Colonel, Pissweak World, Ouchy Wouchy Heart, The Mr. Whippy Grand Prix, Things wogs won’t do, plus literally dozens more sketches. You’ll laugh ‘til you cry!

results.title: The Bessemer converter
results.creator_credit: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare, Film Producers Guild and Merton Park
results.brief_description: This film describes the structure and operation of the Bessemer Convertor for making steel. Shows the raw materials, explains the chemical reactions which occur in the convertor, and points out the difference between basic and acid convertors.
